data.description: Versatile and competitive credit card that earns Qantas Points on eligible purchases.
data.name: Visa Platinum Rewards Credit Card

bundles.description: Customers with an active, fully funded Partnership Advantage Home Loan also receive benefits on our credit card products.
bundles.name: Partnership Advantage Bundle

constraints.additionalInfo: A minimum loan amount of $500 applies to this product.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
Borrowers must be aged 16 or older to apply. Applicants under 18 years of age, but over 16 years, may only enter into a loan contract with an adult as a guarantor.
Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply.
Borrowers must demonstrate at least 6 months continuing employment history at the time of application.
The customer must be a natural person rather than another legal entity
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

features.additionalInfo: Ability to make extra payments or repay the balance in full at any time.
Automatic payments can be scheduled to pay your bills and/or split your pay into designated savings accounts.
Track payments with SMS and email alerts
Up to 45 days interest free on purchases
Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want with RAB mobile and internet banking.
Visa Debit Card available to Australian Residents and members aged > 14 years

you'll earn 0.75 Qantas Points for every $1 you spend on eligible purchases – up to $10,000 and 7,500 points in each statement period. Plus you'll earn a bonus additional Qantas Point for every $1 spent on Qantas products and services. Best of all, you'll enjoy complimentary Qantas Frequent Flyer membership so you can start collecting points right away, as well as an additional 10,000 points every year!
Make deposits and withdrawals through a Bank@Post facility at Australia Post outlets. For full details refer to our Conditions of Use. Fees and charges apply.
This account can be used to send an NPP payment.
No withdrawal fees at Regional Australia Bank ATMs. Transactions at other financial institutions’ ATMs may incur a fee. The Cash Advance rate may apply.
features.additionalValue: ATM, Internet, Mobile & Phone Banking transactions

features.additionalInfo: Additional secondary cardholders are available where more than one card is required. An initial card on each account, replacements for defective cards and automatic card renewals are free. A fee applies for each additional card ordered at your request.
Apple, Samsung and Google Pay can be attached to the product on request.
Combined balances of up to $250,000 per account holder are guaranteed and secured by the Australian Government.
Get in control of your finances and use additional accounts for budgeting.

Speed isn’t the only major advance of the NPP and Osko. Rather than needing hard-to-remember BSBs and account numbers, Osko users can make transactions using a ‘PayID’. This can be their mobile number, personal email or ABN.
features.additionalValue: This account can be used as the target of an NPP PayID.

features.additionalInfo: Qantas Points and Qantas Bonus Points are subject to the Regional Australia Bank Visa Conditions of Use and the Qantas Frequent Flyer Terms and Conditions. Eligible purchases do not include fees, cash, cash equivalent transactions, BPAY, refunds and balance transfers debited from the card account. To be eligible, the account must be open and not in arrears at the time of crediting points within that monthly statement cycle. Selected Qantas products and services are Qantas passenger flights (with a QF flight number) purchased on the Qantas merchant account, and Qantas Frequent Flyer and Qantas Club membership joining and annual fees apply. Excludes Jetstar, Qantas Holidays, Qantas branded non airfare products, Qantas Freight and Qantas Staff Travel. A joining fee usually applies however, this joining fee will be waived by Regional Australia Bank. It is available to new applicants who are not already Qantas Frequent Flyer members and who apply for membership online through qantas.com/joinffregionalaustraliabank. This offer is non-transferable and not available in conjunction with any other offer. Qantas Frequent Flyer membership and each application is subject to approval by Qantas. To be eligible for the additional 10,000 bonus points the facility must not be in arrears at any time during the yearly period, bonus points will be credited on the 11th month anniversary of the yearly period and every 12 months thereafter.

fees.name: Duplicate Copy of Statement
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if you request a duplicate copy of a formal account statement.

fees.name: Inactive Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies annually if there are no transactions on your membership in the preceding 12 months.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where a direct debit request is rejected by us due to insufficient funds in your account.

fees.name: Transaction Listing Print Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you ask us to print a listing of your transactions. A minimum fee of $2.50 applies plus $0.50 per additional 2 pages or part thereof to a maximum of $10.00.

fees.name: Foreign Currency Cheque Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when a foreign currency cheque or draft that has been deposited into an account has been dishonoured.

fees.name: Secure Token Replacement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Secure Tokens are used to authorise large transactions initiated by Internet and Mobile Banking. The initial token is free, but this fee is levied to replace each broken or lost token.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each cheque deposited to your account that is dishonoured by the drawer’s bank.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments and we are required to issue a default notice to you.

fees.name: Over the Counter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per counter withdrawal or debit transfer once the monthly limit of 6 included withdrawals is exceeded.

discounts.additionalInfo: Members with a monthly membership balance greater than $5,000 are exempt.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Members with a monthly membership balance greater than $5,000 are exempt.

fees.name: Interest on Over Limit Balances
fees.additionalInfo: If your account becomes overdrawn default interest will apply on the amount that exceeds the available balance at an interest rate 3% above the Standard Overdraft rate. If your overdraft exceeds its credit limit an interest rate 3% above the existing overdraft rate will apply to the over limit amount for each day the account is over the limit.

fees.name: Bank@Post Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you perform a deposit or withdrawal on your account through a Bank@Post outlet. This fee also applies if your transaction is declined.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Your first 10 cheque deposits to your membership each month are free, each subsequent deposit will be charged per cheque.

fees.name: Document Searches
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per hour, or part thereof, when you request us to retrieve historical documents related to your account.

fees.name: Electronic Transfer Recall Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you erroneously request a funds transfer to an external account and subsequently ask us to attempt to recall the transaction

fees.name: Inward Telegraphic Transfer FEE (in AUD)
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to incoming Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS)/ Telegraphic Transfers received to your account.

fees.name: Over Limit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each day that a Direct Debit or Cheque transaction is debited to a member which results in a deposit or overdraft account being drawn beyond its available balance or limit.

fees.name: Visa Platinum Rewards Credit Card Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies on initiation of your Visa Platinum Rewards Credit Card and during that month of each subsequent year. The fee does not apply to additional cardholders on the same Visa Platinum Rewards account.

discounts.additionalInfo: $195 Annual Fee waived for customers who hold an active, funded Partnership Advantage Home Loan.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Annual Fee waived for customers who hold an active, funded Partnership Advantage Home Loan.

fees.name: Electronic Transfer Trace Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you erroneously request a funds transfer to an external account and subsequently request us to check the transaction.

fees.name: Replacement Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The initial card on each account, replacements for defective cards and automatic card renewals are free, however a fee applies for each replacement card ordered at your request.

fees.name: Emergency Visa Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if you request us to issue you with an emergency replacement card whilst overseas.

fees.name: Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to withdrawals and purchases made outside of Australia using your Regional Australia Bank Visa Debit or Access Card.

fees.name: Dormant Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if there is no member generated transaction activity on your account for a period of seven (7) years.

fees.name: Declined Visa Dispute Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you opt to dispute or request further information from the merchant about a Visa transaction. The fee will only apply to each dispute where evidence suggests you participated in or authorised the transaction, or failed to sufficiently protect your card details.

fees.name: Foreign Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each foreign cheque, whether in Australian dollars or another currency, deposited into your account.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is per annum (p.a.). Interest is charged immediately on any cash advance. Internal branch transfers that debit the Visa Platinum Rewards Credit Card will be treated as a cash advance and interest will be charged immediately. BPAY transactions and Balance Transfers from Visa Platinum Rewards Credit Card accounts will be treated as cash advances and interest will be charged immediately.

Interest is per annum (p.a.). For each purchase that a customer makes they will receive an interest free period of up to 45 days.Each monthly statement will show a payment due date that is at least 24 days from the statement date. The customer does not pay any interest on purchases on that statement until after the due date.
